question: return the rating of each hotel
sql_query1: select h.name, r.Customer_Reviews from reviews r inner join hotels h on h.hotelid=r.hotelid
sql_query2: select h.name, r.Number_Of_Stars from reviews r inner join hotels h on h.hotelid=r.hotelid
sql_query3: select h.name, r.Customer_Reviews, Number_Of_Stars from reviews r inner join hotels h on h.hotelid=r.hotelid
interpretation1: How did the customers review each hotel?
interpretation2: How many stars were assigned to each hotel?
interpretation3: What reviews did the customers leave for each hotel and how many stars were assigned to these hotels?
sql_query_general: select h.name, r.rating from reviews r inner join hotels h on h.hotelid=r.hotelid

question: return ratings and customers
sql_query1: select c.fullname, r.Customer_Reviews from reviews r inner join Customers c on c.CustomerID =r. CustomerID
sql_query2: select c.fullname, r.Number_Of_Stars from reviews r inner join Customers c on c.CustomerID =r. CustomerID
sql_query3: select c.fullname, r.Customer_Reviews, Number_Of_Stars from reviews r inner join Customers c on c.CustomerID =r. CustomerID
interpretation2: How many stars did each customer give?
interpretation3: return customer reviews, number of stars and customers
sql_query_general: select c.fullname, r.rating from reviews r inner join Customers c on c.CustomerID =r. CustomerID
